Alright. I am now in charge of updating the website. Just to clear a 
few things up, the site is: 

http://www.nbwrpg.com/~rauq/

It can also be reached by typing http://www.nbwrpg.com/ but NOT by 
typing http://www.nbwrpg.com/~zardus/ k? (going to the /~zardus/ 
extension won't get you to the page that's being updated, it'll get 
you to the back up page.)

The events page is majorly in need of an update. I changed a few 
things already, but I haven't been reading all of the posts, so I'm 
not exactly sure what's happening with each faction right now. I 
wouldn't mind at all if people were to email me with Base Locations, 
Faction happenings, Battles, Treaties, and Relationships.

The characters page is also now up to date with current times.
